name: Escape Cave
description:
Try your best to escape the black cave!

Tap the screen to move right!

Be careful! Don't touch the wall, and the stones that rolling down,

And if touched,one tail could save your life once.

If touched the wall or stones and have no tail, game will be end.

Get the tails as many as you can!

You also need to avoid the obstacles like the bats, spiders, sharp of plants, and drop water...

Good luck!
